name: Jellyfin Media Server
check_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker ps --filter 'name=jellyfin' --filter 'status=running' --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -qE '^jellyfin$' && echo active || echo inactive; else echo skip; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker start jellyfin 2>/dev/null || docker restart jellyfin 2>/dev/null || echo 'Failed to start Jellyfin'; else echo skip; fi
verify_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then sleep 5; curl -fs --max-time 5 http://localhost:8096/System/Ping 2>/dev/null && echo 'Jellyfin responding' || docker ps --filter 'name=jellyfin' --format '{{.Names}} {{.Status}}'; else echo verified; fi
